amendment.description: To protect the prerogatives of the Congress in the allocation of homeland security funding.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 508 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 120.
Amendment SA 508 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S4777, S4785; text: CR S4777) To protect the prerogatives of the Congress in the allocation of homeland security funding.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 508 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 120.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 508 proposed by Senator Byrd.
